name: MEC Shadow Long Sleeve Sun Shirt - Infants
description:
Comfortable sun protection for canoe passengers and sandcastle engineers. The high neckline protects the vulnerable area at the back of a child's neck. Short sleeves let their arms breathe on hot days, and bright colours let them choose a style they’ll love to wear.Made of polyester and LYCRA® fabric that resists chlorine and has a UPF 50 rating.Flatlocked seams prevent chafing from sand and salt.High collar extends sun coverage.Raglan sleeves promote range of motion for paddling or swimming.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Tight, with no room to spare.





Very close fit, with a bit of room.





Generous, but not oversized.





Oversized with lots of room for layers.


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability
